channel.title: CVE Feed for LG Electronics -- LG SuperSign CMS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for LG Electronics -- LG SuperSign CMS

item.title: CVE-2024-6176|2024-08-01T21:33:05.071Z -- lg%20electronics -- lg%20supersign%20cms
item.description: Allocation of Resources Without Limits or Throttling vulnerability in LG Electronics LG SuperSign CMS allows Port Scanning.This issue affects LG SuperSign CMS: from 4.1.3 before < 4.3.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-6176|2024-06-20T17:37:46.215Z -- lg%20electronics -- lg%20supersign%20cms
item.description: Allocation of Resources Without Limits or Throttling vulnerability in LG Electronics LG SuperSign CMS allows Port Scanning.This issue affects LG SuperSign CMS: from 4.1.3 before < 4.3.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-6177|2024-06-20T00:52:25.226Z -- lg%20electronics -- lg%20supersign%20cms
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in LG Electronics LG SuperSign CMS allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects LG SuperSign CMS: from 4.1.3 before < 4.3.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-6176|2024-06-25T02:05:25.150Z -- lg%20electronics -- lg%20supersign%20cms
item.description: Allocation of Resources Without Limits or Throttling vulnerability in LG Electronics LG SuperSign CMS allows Port Scanning.This issue affects LG SuperSign CMS: from 4.1.3 before < 4.3.1.
